data.title: Flash of Genius - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Flash of Genius with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
57 Metascore

2008

1 hr 59 mins

Drama

PG13

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Greg Kinnear stars in this inspiring fact-based story about a college professor and part-time engineer who took on corporate titans in a long legal battle with the U.S. automobile industry to receive recognition for one of his inventions. Lauren Graham, Dermot Mulroney, Alan Alda, Daniel Roebuck. Directed by Marc Abraham.
